text: Heinz "Heiner" Kördell (8 January 1932 – 2 October 2020) was a German footballer. In 1958, he was German champion with Schalke 04. He played one international match for West Germany. Kördell died on 2 October 2020, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== *Heiner Kördell's profile at FC Schalke 04-Website Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Heinz Kördell
